2018-01-25 14:45
Announcing the launch of the #JAMstack London meetup. Interested in learning about how this ecosystem is maturing? Talking about things like SSGs, CI, #HeadlessCMS, and other aspects of modern web development? 3 x 20min talks & some friendly discussion. https://t.co/XkI5HK2TEx
